Types of Ninja

Genin

carried out missions and assasinations. Often times, for matters of secrecy and security, they did not even know who other genin were that were also working on the same missions. This way in the event they were captured, they could not reveal other ninja, thus affording the continued chances for success of the mission. Additionally, they may not even know the name or face of the Chunin, their supervisor who tasked themâ€¦

Chunin

assigned the genin ninjas missions based on the genin ninja's skills and abilities. They had more of an operations type of roll and knew how to lead and direct their team. They recieved their orders from the Jonin

Jonin

upper level ninja were similar to Generals in todays military. They had an overall strategic command and picture of all battles, objectives, missions and goals.
